summary: AN ORDINANCE authorizing the City to develop a plan, including a finance plan, for a city-wide monorail system approximately 40 miles in length serving the four quadrants of Seattle; authorizing an appropriation of $6,000,000 to carry out a study to develop such a plan; and referring this ordinance to a vote of the qualified electors of the City at the election to be held on November 7, 2000.
